channel.title: Phising on My notes and snippets
channel.description: Recent content in Phising on My notes and snippets

item.title: Phising
item.description: Phising Misconfigurations and vulnerable software are not the only way into a targets network. Phishing can be a very valuable wrench in your toolkit, its perfect to gather credentials, sessions or even shells. Session Hijack Steal creds and/or session cookies. Can be useful when client has good prevention against shells. Email a link to a target employee pointing to a cloned/proxied auth portal (Microsoft Online(O365, Azure), G-suite. AWS Console). When they auth they get a real session cookies, and so do we.
